about.headline: Mechatronics Engineering Student | Software Developer | AI & Data Enthusiast
about.summary: I am a sophomore Mechatronics Engineering student at Al-Balqa Applied University with a strong focus on software development, artificial intelligence, and data-driven systems. I have solid experience in Python programming, desktop application development using PyQt5, and building standalone web applications. My interests lie in designing efficient, secure, and offline-capable systems that bridge software intelligence with real-world engineering applications. I am continuously expanding my knowledge in AI, data science, cybersecurity fundamentals, and system-level programming, aiming to build robust, scalable, and intelligent solutions.
